nodes.name: Weak Point Strike
nodes.desc: When dealing DMG, Basic Attacks have a fixed 10% chance to trigger Weak Point Strike once.

nodes.name: Rage Awakening
nodes.desc: Consuming Rage has a chance to enter Enraged state for 5s. The more Rage you consume, the higher the chance. Each Rage increases the chance by 1%.

nodes.name: Enhanced Weak Point Strike
nodes.desc: Weak Point Strike's fixed trigger chance +10%.

nodes.name: Life Suppress
nodes.desc: You gain the Suppress Specialization effect.

nodes.name: Stone Fragment Tide
nodes.desc: For 8s after you cast Tectonic Ring, each Basic Attack pulls a target between 8 and 20 meters away toward you. The same target cannot be pulled again within 3s.

nodes.name: Sandstone Revival
nodes.desc: For each 1 Sand Crystal consumed, restore 1% of Max HP.

nodes.name: Enrage Delay
nodes.desc: When Strength reaches 500, extends the duration of Enraged by 1 second.

nodes.name: Valiant Fury
nodes.desc: When Enraged, you gain 30% bonus Armor, decreasing by 5% per second.

nodes.name: Fury Shelter
nodes.desc: In the state of Enrage, Max HP bonus +20%.

nodes.name: Block Spec
nodes.desc:
Replace Special Attack with Counter crush, and enhance the ability.
When Lucky Block triggers, increases Block DMG RED by 10%

nodes.name: Heart of Rock
nodes.desc:
Casting Granite Fury 10 times grants Heart of Rock.
Heart of Rock: for 10s, Granite Fury evolves into Boulder Smash. Casting Boulder Smash guarantees Enraged status.

nodes.name: Rampart Fury
nodes.desc: When taking DMG, increases Lucky Block DMG RED by 2% for 8s, stacks up to 3 times.

nodes.name: Earth Shard
nodes.desc: After casting Boulder Smash, for the next 10s, summons 1 Rock Projectile every 2s.

nodes.name: Enraged Rock Heart
nodes.desc: While Enraged, increases Lucky Hit Chance by 10%.

nodes.name: Sand Block
nodes.desc: Successfully Blocking has a fixed 20% chance to gain 1 Sand Crystal. If it was a Lucky Block, gain an additional 1 Sand Crystal.

nodes.name: Shattering Rageblow
nodes.desc:
When dealing DMB, Granite Fury has a 20% chance to allow your next Basic Attack to evolve into Rageblow. Each 2% Luck adds 1% chance.
After casting Rageblow, increases Block DMG RED by 10% for 10s.

nodes.name: Block Recovery
nodes.desc:
Successful Block restores 1% of your HP and 2 Rage. This can only occur once per second.
Triggering Lucky Block restores 2% of your HP and 4 Rage. This can only occur once per second.

nodes.name: Block Counterstrike
nodes.desc: A successful Block triggers a Countercrush, once per second. On a Lucky Block, randomly triggers 1 to 3 Countercrush, once per second.

nodes.name: Fortune Bastion
nodes.desc: During Bastion, you can block Magic Damage.

nodes.name: Granite Fury
nodes.desc: For every 50 Rage generated, summons 1 Rock Projectile.

nodes.name: Block Shelter
nodes.desc:
Granite Fury DMG enhances Lucky block DMG RED by 2% for 8s.
Stacks up to 3 times.

nodes.name: Shadow Veil
nodes.desc:
Each enemy within 3 meters increases your Block chance by 3%, up to 15%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)
Remains unchanged when Earthfort Spec is active.
If Block Spec is activated, the effect becomes: Every enemy within 3 meters increases Block DMG RED by 1%, up to 5%.
(Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)

nodes.name: Granite Combo
nodes.desc: When Rock Projectile deals DMG, there is a chance, of which equals Lucky Hit Chance, to summon an additional Rock Projectile.

nodes.name: Resonant Domain
nodes.desc: Tectonic Ring generates a Sandfield that lasts for 5s.

nodes.name: Block Blessing
nodes.desc: A successful Block grants a fixed 30% chance for your next Granite Fury cast to consume no Sand Crystals. This effect can occur up to once every 3s.

nodes.name: Counter Storm
nodes.desc: For 10s after casting Tectonic Ring, trigger 1 Block Counterstrike every 2s.

nodes.name: Rock Heal
nodes.desc: Stone Fist restores 5% max HP. For every 1 extra enemy hit, restores an additional 2% max HP (up to a total of 15%). Excess healing is converted into an equivalent Shield.

nodes.name: Group Suppress
nodes.desc: Each enemy within 3 meters enhances the effectiveness of Suppress by 3%, up to 15%. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

nodes.name: Survival Instinct
nodes.desc: When HP falls below 30%, triggers Last Stand, once every 60s.

nodes.name: Sandstone Shock
nodes.desc: While in the Brave Bastion state, casting Countercrush or Granite Fury triggers Sand Crystal Shock.

nodes.name: Rock Mastery
nodes.desc:
Increases Mastery by 600.
While Brave Bastion is active, increases Mastery by 8%.

nodes.name: Intimidation
nodes.desc: When Rock Projectile hits a target, it reduces all DMG taken by 10% for the next 5s.

nodes.name: Sandstone Rewind
nodes.desc: When Rageblow deals DMG, it reduces the CD of Brave Bastion by 3s.

nodes.name: Granite Fury
nodes.desc: Summoning 20 Rock Projectiles grants Heart of Rock: For 10s, Granite Fury evolves into Stone Fist.

nodes.name: Sandgrip
nodes.desc: After casting Sandgrip, gains 10% Versatility for 10s.

nodes.name: Rampart Fortitude
nodes.desc: While Brave Bastion is active, taking DMG increases Countercrush DMG by 10% for 10s, stacks up to 10 times.

nodes.name: Earthfort Spec
nodes.desc:
Further enhances Shield Bash.
Each additional enemy hit by Shield Slam increases its DMG by 30%, up to 150%.

nodes.name: Amplified Earthfort
nodes.desc: Upon the triggering of Weak Point Strike, gains Amplified Earthfort.

nodes.name: Starfall
nodes.desc: For every 20 Sand Crystals consumed, Star Shatter evolves into Starfall.

nodes.name: Star Fury
nodes.desc: Increases Star Shatter and Starfall DMG by 30%, and guarantees Enraged status.

nodes.name: Shatter Strike
nodes.desc: When Star Shatter or Starfall defeats a target, Star Shatter immediately recovers 1 charge.

nodes.name: Elemental Harmony
nodes.desc: While shielded, Magic Damage and Wind DMG you take are -25% and 50% respectively.

nodes.name: Lord of the Great Rock
nodes.desc: Casting Starfall grants Lord of Rock: For 15s, Basic Attack evolves into 1 Rupture, and Rage Burst evolves into 1 Terra Sunder.

nodes.name: Shield Echo
nodes.desc: During Sandshroud, adding a shield to yourself via Shield Bash triggers Shield Echo.

nodes.name: Breath of Stone
nodes.desc: Each Sand Crystal consumed reduces the CD of Stoneform by 1s.

nodes.name: Shield Bash
nodes.desc:
Enhances Shield effectiveness by 10%.
During Sandshroud, additionally enhances Shield effectiveness by 10%.

nodes.name: Resonant Domain
nodes.desc: Tectonic Ring generates a Sandfield that lasts for 5s.

nodes.name: Enrage Expansion
nodes.desc: In the state of Enrage, attack speed +8%.

nodes.name: Stone Domain
nodes.desc:
During the duration of Sandshroud, being attacked reduces the attack speed of enemy targets within a 5 meter radius by 30% for 3s.
During the duration of Sandshroud, Armor of allies within an 8 meter radius +10%.

nodes.name: Shadow Veil
nodes.desc:
Each enemy within 3 meters increases your Block chance by 3%, up to 15%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)
Remains unchanged when Earthfort Spec is active.
If Block Spec is activated, the effect becomes: Every enemy within 3 meters increases Block DMG RED by 1%, up to 5%.
(Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)

nodes.name: Rage Burst Improvement
nodes.desc:
Rage Burst gains 1 additional charge.
While Enraged, Rage Burst and Terra Sunder become instant cast.

nodes.name: Lord of Rocks
nodes.desc: Casting Starfall grants Lord of Rock: For15s, Basic Attack evolves into 1 Rupture, and Rage Burst evolves into 1 Terra Sunder.

nodes.name: Shield Combo
nodes.desc: Basic Attacks have a fixed 5% chance to trigger Shield Combo upon dealing DMG. Each 1% Mastery grants an extra 0.2% chance.

nodes.name: Enraged Rupture
nodes.desc: While Enraged, Rupture is bound to trigger Weak Point Strike.

nodes.name: Boulder Shield
nodes.desc: During Stoneform, reduces all DMG taken by 10%.

nodes.name: Group Suppress
nodes.desc: Each enemy within 3 meters enhances the effectiveness of Suppress by 3%, up to 15%. This effect is doubled against Elite or stronger enemies.

nodes.name: Bravery in Battle
nodes.desc: In combat, 50% of overhealing converts to a shield (accumulated shield cannot exceed 50% of Max HP).

nodes.name: Survival Instinct
nodes.desc: When HP falls below 30%, triggers Last Stand, once every 60s.

nodes.name: Resolute Breath
nodes.desc: While shielded, use Basic Attack midair to slam down, detonating the shield and dealing damage equal to 30% max HP to nearby enemies.

nodes.name: Slam Shelter
nodes.desc: A successful hit with Shield Bash reduces the target's DMG dealt to you by 3% for 10s, stacking up to 3 times.

nodes.name: Recovery
nodes.desc: Each successful hit of Expertise Skill or Special Attack increases Strength by 1% in 5s. The effect stacks up to 10 times. With 10 stacks, increases Strength by 10% for 8s. During this effect, the next Expertise Skill heals you for 20% of the DMG dealt, yet no additional Strength stacks can be gained.

nodes.name: Smash Support
nodes.desc: Increases the effectiveness of Shield granted by Shield Bash by 30%.

nodes.name: Star Shatter Pursuit
nodes.desc: Star Shatter and Starfall deals additionally 200% DMG to targets with current HP less than or equal to 35%.

nodes.name: Sandy Shelter
nodes.desc: During Stoneform, every 20 Rage gained triggers Sandy shelter.

nodes.name: Rock Guard
nodes.desc:
Armor +5%.
Each attack of Terra Sunder deals an additional instance of Attack Damage to the target, equal to 100% Armor.
